channel.title: Comments on: All My Sheepies
channel.description: tales in the life of Madeline Ann Downey

item.title: By: Jonas
item.dc:creator: Jonas
item.description:
thanks Alma, hope you are well!
Also: I need to make an addendum to this post. There is a new sheepy, Jennie Sheepy. And I forgot about Dr. Bojangles.
item.content:encoded:
thanks Alma, hope you are well!

Also: I need to make an addendum to this post. There is a new sheepy, Jennie Sheepy. And I forgot about Dr. Bojangles.

item.title: By: alma vogt
item.dc:creator: alma vogt
item.description: Happy belated birthday to Madeline. Hard to believe that a year went by so quickly. She is a real beauty and very lucky to have such wonderful parents.
item.content:encoded: Happy belated birthday to Madeline. Hard to believe that a year went by so quickly. She is a real beauty and very lucky to have such wonderful parents.

item.title: By: katie
item.dc:creator: katie
item.description: just ignore my singing in that video... LOL she is so funny!!
item.content:encoded: just ignore my singing in that video… LOL she is so funny!!
